other_title: 逆転裁判 ～その「真実」、異議あり！～ (Japanese)
plot: Rookie lawyer Ryūichi Naruhodō faces his first murder case; the accused defendant is his grade school classmate Masashi Yahari. With limited evidence, logic has become the only weapon Naruhodō has in order to turn the case around when all the odds are stacked against him.
opening_theme: "Jinsei wa Subarashii" (人生は素晴らしい; Life is Wonderful) by Johnny's West
ending_theme: "Junai Chaos" (純愛カオス; Pure Love Chaos) by Tokyo Performance Doll
